description.title: The description Schema
examples:
In its early days, Yellowstone National Park was protected by the US Army. Learn about important historic park events and discover the role of the U.S. military in protecting Yellowstone on this short, relaxed walk around Fort Yellowstone. For all ages. Accessible.
Meet in front of Albright Visitor Center.

examples.title: Calling in the Cavalry
